cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on March 18, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1833, DHS Industrial Control Systems Capabilities Enhancement Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 46 (Thursday, March 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KATKO:
H.R. 1833.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII of the Constitution
[Page H1358]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: DHS Industrial Control Systems Capabilities Enhancement Act of 2021
